sentences.sContent: The Canadian Oxford Dictionary also lists garbage mitt—a new one on me—that is supposedly a heavily padded deerskin mitten favoured by garbage men.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Canadian Oxford Dictionary also lists garbage mitt—a new one on me—that is supposedly a heavily padded deerskin mitten favoured by garbage men.
sentences.sCn: 《加拿大牛津英语词典》还列出了“垃圾手套”——我也是第一次看到——它应该是一种塞了很多棉花的鹿皮手套，分量较重，受到收垃圾的人的喜爱。

words.tran: 手；棒球手套；连指手套；女用露指长手套

trans.tranCn: 棒球手套, 拳击手套
trans.tranOther: a type of  glove  that does not have separate parts for each finger
